title.rendered: Vaughan Plumbing: Incorporating Classic Styles Into Modern Bathroom Remodels

content.rendered:
A bathroom remodel is a great move if you want to increase your property value, boost the space’s functionality or update the aesthetics. While do-it-yourself renovations may be attractive at first, hiring professional plumbing repair and maintenance services is the better option. Not only do you have a quality guarantee, but experts work quickly, minimizing the mess and inconvenience of construction. Additionally, an experienced contractor can help you choose a design that fits your needs.

How Plumbing Repair and Maintenance Services Can Benefit Your Bathroom Remodel

It’s easy to come up with ideas for a remodel, but making them a reality is a challenge. If you don’t have experience in renovations, you may not recognize the limitations:

  • Space
  • Regulations
  • Cost

A handyman in Vaughan knows these restrictions and can offer compromises or adaptions. Together, you can create a bathroom that looks and functions how you envisioned.

Know Your Style

Choosing a popular style ensures your design is cohesive. There are plenty of options trending, and your contractor can help you find one that fits your personal aesthetic.

If you want something timeless, consider a traditional bathroom design. These focus on natural materials, white ceramicware and water-related decor themes.

Fans of luxury and bold design may prefer an Art Deco theme. To achieve the grandeur of this 1930s movement, match vibrant colours with gold accents and embrace clean, simple shapes.

What if you want something comfy? Your expert in plumbing repair and maintenance services may recommend midcentury modern. This style utilizes warm colours such as mustard, burnt orange, brown and olive. Teal, navy and deep greens add pops of contrast.

Finally, fans of simplicity will find a good fit with minimalistic industrial designs. These bathrooms feature concrete floors, exposed pipes and brick walls for an optimized, modern feel.

Add Character

Broad styles create a foundation for you to customize. Your local bathroom remodelling services can help you turn a generic industrial bathroom into your personal haven with the right wallpaper, mirrors and lighting.

When choosing a wallpaper, make sure you opt for a moisture-resistant brand. Otherwise, you may face issues with mould and mildew later on.

For mirrors, don’t be afraid to go big. Vanity mirrors are a central feature of bathrooms and offer great utility. They can also make a dark bathroom feel brighter and a small one appear larger.

Finally, lighting is just as much about safety as aesthetics. Your repair and maintenance services experts will help you place lighting fixtures strategically to minimize the risk of slipping and maximize the area’s visual appeal.

Update Tile and Fixtures

Once you have your design fully customized, it’s time to choose the tile and fixtures. Ceramic tiles create a modern feel, while stone offers a more natural effect; the former works well with minimalist industrial, while the latter matches traditional styles.

Hardware’s impact on the aesthetic is more subtle but still essential to tie the room together. Your chosen finish can complement or contrast other decor elements, so consider carefully:

  • Matte black
  • Polished steel
  • Brushed nickel
  • Copper
  • Satin bronze

Choose Finishing Touches

Finishing touches make the design feel complete. Unique details make your new space stand out to guests (and potential buyers if you plan to sell):

  • Floating shelves
  • Towel racks
  • Window treatments

You can also have your contractor custom-build storage, such as rolling carts, over-the-door holders and built-in medicine cabinets.

Where To Find Plumbing Repair and Maintenance Services

Handyman Connection provides plumbing repair and maintenance services in Vaughan. If it’s time to give your bathroom an upgrade, there’s no better team; these experts can help with flooring, plumbing, electrical work and more. Get your free estimate today by calling or submitting an online request.
